page.title: 20Toys.
page.content: A skateboard is a board curved up at the front,on four wheels 4cm in diameter.You can stand or sit on the board.It is fast and some padding is needed on knees and elbows.Skilled children can negotiate the ramps and steps and other hazards built for them out of doors. A rollerboot is a boot on wheels. A stopper at the front can be used as a brake.A rollerdisco is held indoors. you pay to get in and can hire boots as well.The boots are made of leather or plastic in many bright colours. Impossible ball is a small ball made of foam.It is unevenly weighted so that it will roll but when you throw it in the air it wriggles about a lot. It is better to play with it outside because it moves quickly in unexpected directions.
